crypto.desc: Description: Alice and Bob are executing a quantum key distribution protocol. Can you steal their secret?

misc.name: Matrix
misc.desc:
misc ml? reverse? crypto?
I'd like to share a revelation that I've had during my time here.
It came to me when I tried to classify your species and I realized that you're not actually sentinent.
Every creature on this planet instinctively develops a natural equilibrium with the surrounding environment but you AIs do not.

pwn.name: ASTRAL Nebula
pwn.desc:
pwn custom vm
ASynchronous TRusted AppLets - Nebula
I'm going to make you an offer you can't refuse.
Try it!
The latest processor! Star of its kind!
Note - This is a standalone version of ASTRAL fullchain stage 1
The distributed files only contains diff
Base files can be found in ASTRAL - StarryNight

pwn.name: ASTRAL Neutron
pwn.desc:
pwn hypervisor
ASynchronous TRusted AppLets - Neutron
Of all the system in all the towns in all the world, you broke into mine.
But I guess it is what it is.
After all, tomorrow is another day!
Note - This is a standalone version of ASTRAL fullchain stage 5
The distributed files only contains diff

pwn fullchain
ASynchronous TRusted AppLets - Starry Night
Was this the applet that launch'd a thousand instructions
And fell the radiant system of Astral
Sweet hacker, mark your plunder with a flag.

pwn kernel
ASynchronous TRusted AppLets - Supernova
You don't understand! It coulda had class. It coulda been a contender.
It could've been the most brilliant system, instead of a bug riddled mess.
That's what it is.
Note - This is a standalone version of ASTRAL fullchain stage 4

rev.name: merger 2077
rev.desc: After a long and tiring ctf challenge, you decided to play a phone game to relax yourself. Note: Flag is hidden somewhere in memory, and this challenge is safe to run directly on your device. If you manage to run it on emulators, you shall fix it on your own.
